 Typical Climate in Kathmandu for context

 Season  Months  Typical Temperatures °C  Rainfall 

 Winter  December – February  2 – 14 night lows can drop near freezing  Very little 
 Spring  March – May  10 – 22  Light showers increasing toward May 
 Monsoon Summer  June – September  18 – 28  Heavy rain especially July  August 
 Autumn  October – November  12 – 24  Generally dry and clear 

So if you’re planning a trip or an outdoor activity knowing the season can help you anticipate what the weather is likely to be like but for the exact temperature precipitation and any alerts right now please refer to one of the real‑time sources listed above
